item.description:
This will officially be my last golf outing with this awesome Meetup group. I will be relocating back home to Colorado. I hope quite a few people can make it out this Sunday. Everyone that I've golfed with has been wonderful. I booked 2 tee times. One at 2:03pm and the other at 2:11pm. Tee times are under my last name: Robbins

Green fees are $29 (walking) or $46 (riding) for the month of August. (normal green fee is $47 + $32 for the cart). I will be walking the course with a pull cart.

Let me know if there are any questions!

Thanks!
Chuck
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in clubhouse and/or starting point 15 min prior

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Mt. Hood Golf Club - Aug. 22nd
